sentences.en: A heat exchanger, in a narrow sense, is a vessel.
sentences.cn: 从狭义来说, 换热器是一种容器.

sentences.en: After the water plate heat exchanger should be met.
sentences.cn: 而经过板式换热器的热水应满足.

sentences.en: Any ion electrostatically bound to the exchanger is referred to as counterion.
sentences.cn: 靠静电引力结合在交换剂上的离子,叫做平衡离子.

sentences.en: But bremen semi - automatic plate exchanger increases operations, reduces efficiency.
sentences.cn: 但北人的半自动换版系统增加了操作的时, 降低了效率.

sentences.en: Development, structure and specific characteristics of Rodbaffle heat exchanger are introduced briefly.
sentences.cn: 简要介绍了折流杆换热器的研究进展 、 结构特征和特性.

sentences.en: Globally consolidate and integrate heat exchanger demand across industries, customers and applications.
sentences.cn: 面向并整合全球各行业 、 各类客户与应用领域的换热器需求.

sentences.en: Reaction Engines is focusing on a critical piece of technology called a heat exchanger, needed to rapidly cool the air before it can be used by the spaceplane's engines.
sentences.cn: 反应引擎部着力于一种称为热交换的关键技术,该技术需要快速冷却空气,在其可被空天飞机的引擎利用之前。

sentences.en: Slowly close the bypass on the hottest stream flowing through the exchanger.
sentences.cn: 慢慢关闭流过热交换器的温度较低的流体上的旁通.

sentences.en: Sulfur condenser is a sort of fixed tube - sheet heat exchanger.
sentences.cn: 硫磺冷凝器属于固定管板 式 换热器,结构复杂,几何尺寸庞大.

sentences.en: The gas can be cooled by a heat exchanger after the air heater.
sentences.cn: 烟气可以用空气加热器后的热交换器来冷却.

sentences.en: The heat - pipe exchanger is a new - type, high - efficiency device of heat transfer.
sentences.cn: 热管换热器是一种新型的高效换热设备.

sentences.en: The muhistream heat exchanger network is a new - style heat exchanger network.
sentences.cn: 多流股换热器网络是一种新型的换热器网络.

sentences.en: The plate - fin beat exchanger is one of our characteristic products.
sentences.cn: 铝制板翅式换热器是我公司的一大特色产品.

sentences.en: The tube side of exchanger mostly consists of copper brass tubes.
sentences.cn: 通常这些热交换器都以铜管为冷却水通路.

sentences.en: The wavy plate heat exchanger is a new type heat transfer device.
sentences.cn: 波面板换热器是一种新型的换热设备,具有广泛的应用前景.

sentences.en: The Zurich laboratory has already constructed a prototype that feeds the water from the chips into a heat-exchanger.
sentences.cn: 苏黎世实验室已经建造了一个模型，把从芯片中流出的水引入一个热交换器。

sentences.en: Tubesheet is the most important and complicated part of tube - and - shell heat exchanger.
sentences.cn: 而管板是 管壳式 换热器中最重要也是最复杂的承压部件.
